thread.title: Eskisehirspor defender Jerry Akaminko sympathises with Ankara blast victims
thread.title_full: Eskisehirspor defender Jerry Akaminko sympathises with Ankara blast victims

title: Eskisehirspor defender Jerry Akaminko sympathises with Ankara blast victims
text:
22:40 CET Eskisehirspor defender Jerry Akaminko sympathises with Ankara blast victims Jerry Akaminko 
Turkey-based Ghana defender Jerry Akaminko has expressed sympathy with victims of Saturday's bombings in the capital Ankara. 
Two powerful bombs exploded near the main train station this morning, targeting a peace rally and causing carnage. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
